forecast.name: Today

Southeast wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good. The upper trails have the best conditions.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a nearly perfect ski day. The snow dried out thanks to the overnight cold. There is barely a cloud in the sky and sunshine is anticipated for the majority of the day. The temperature will rapidly increase today, and top out around 35 degrees. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
